languages.text:
"Молвил сей дух и умолк навсегда,
Тело достойного Волка покинул, покой даровав".

"Said the spirit,
and then it fell silent forever,
the noble Wolf's body fleeing,
and peace to it bestowing."
languages.original_text:
"Молвил сей дух и умолк навсегда,
Тело достойного Волка покинул, покой даровав".

traits.locale_text:
"Said the spirit,
and then it fell silent forever,
the noble Wolf's body fleeing,
and peace to it bestowing."

"Said the spirit,
and then it fell silent forever,
the noble Wolf's body fleeing,
and peace to it bestowing."

"Молвил сей дух и умолк навсегда,
Тело достойного Волка покинул, покой даровав".

"Said the spirit,
and then it fell silent forever,
the noble Wolf's body fleeing,
and peace to it bestowing."

languages.text:
「精霊はそう言うと
永遠に沈黙した
高貴な狼の肉体は霧散し
平和が授けられた」
languages.original_text:
"Said the spirit,
and then it fell silent forever,
the noble Wolf's body fleeing,
and peace to it bestowing."

traits.locale_text:
「精霊はそう言うと
永遠に沈黙した
高貴な狼の肉体は霧散し
平和が授けられた」

languages.text:
“那灵魂的话语已毕，
便陷入永恒的沉寂。
高贵的狼离开了躯壳，
赐予它永恒的安宁。”
languages.original_text:
"Said the spirit,
and then it fell silent forever,
the noble Wolf's body fleeing,
and peace to it bestowing."

traits.locale_text:
“那灵魂的话语已毕，
便陷入永恒的沉寂。
高贵的狼离开了躯壳，
赐予它永恒的安宁。”

languages.text:
« Dit l'esprit,
avant de se taire à jamais,
quittant le corps du noble loup
et lui accordant la paix. »
languages.original_text:
"Said the spirit,
and then it fell silent forever,
the noble Wolf's body fleeing,
and peace to it bestowing."

traits.locale_text:
« Dit l'esprit,
avant de se taire à jamais,
quittant le corps du noble loup
et lui accordant la paix. »

languages.text:
«Dijo el espíritu antes de caer
en el silencio del descanso eterno,
abandonando del noble Lobo el cuerpo
y otorgándole la paz a su vez».
languages.original_text:
"Said the spirit,
and then it fell silent forever,
the noble Wolf's body fleeing,
and peace to it bestowing."

traits.locale_text:
«Dijo el espíritu antes de caer
en el silencio del descanso eterno,
abandonando del noble Lobo el cuerpo
y otorgándole la paz a su vez».

languages.text:
"Sagte der Geist,
und dann verstummte er für immer,
entwich dem Körper des noblen Wolfs
und schenkte ihm Frieden."
languages.original_text:
"Said the spirit,
and then it fell silent forever,
the noble Wolf's body fleeing,
and peace to it bestowing."

traits.locale_text:
"Sagte der Geist,
und dann verstummte er für immer,
entwich dem Körper des noblen Wolfs
und schenkte ihm Frieden."

languages.text:
"Bunları söyleyen ruh,
Soylu Kurt'un bedeni yok olup
Ruhu huzura kavuşurken
Ebediyen sessizliğe büründü."
languages.original_text:
"Said the spirit,
and then it fell silent forever,
the noble Wolf's body fleeing,
and peace to it bestowing."

traits.locale_text:
"Dedi ruh
ve ebediyen sessizliğe büründü.
soylu Kurt'un bedeni yok oldu,
ruhuna huzur bağışlansın."
